body.name: Sony MP-CD1 Portable Pico, Pocket- Sized, HDMI/MHL, DLP, Short-Throw, 120 Screen, 5000mAh Built-in Battery, Built-in Speaker, WVGA 854 x 480
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: Pocket-sized portable projector. It weighs less than 1lb !
Ansi 105 lumen for bright and dynamic pictures by IntelliBright technology for up to 120” screen– short-throw and automatic Keystone correction
Built in 5000mAh battery with a 2 hrs cable free operation
Attach an HDMI dongle to provide wireless connectivity.Charging Time - Approx. 2.5 hours (from CP-AD3 (sold separately)) Approx. 4 hours (with 1.5 A power supply)
Quick 5-second boot for stress-free setup for your business presentation
body.description: Sony's pocket-sized projector is bright and light. Ideal companion for business professionals, gamers and movie fans. In spite of its pocket-sized design, Sony’s new MP-CD1 Mobile Projector packs a powerful ANSI 105-lumen punch for bright and dynamic pictures.Use it with media-streaming dongles, smartphones, laptops and gaming consoles. For business presentations, weekend parties or outdoor events, the MP-CD1 is the go-anywhere projector you’ve always wanted.Super-convenient portability allows you to put on a show anywhere, anytime.The MP-CD1 is impressively compact and weighs only 9.88 ounces. Just slip it into your briefcase or backpack, and you know you’ll always be ready to make a business pitch during the day or stream an action movie at night. With Texas Instruments DLP IntelliBright technology to intelligently manage brightness and power consumption, this projector punches above its weight. Even in a pocket-friendly size, it offers high brightness (ANSI 105 lumens) thanks to the unique design for minimal heat build-up.Just connect the HDMI cable from your PC and press the projector’s power button. The MP-CD1 boots up in only 5 seconds, so you can go straight into your business presentation without missing a beat.You can attach a HDMI dongle to provides wireless connectivity for many laptop computers and smartphones. The HDMI and USB ports on the MP-CD1 accept a variety of media-streaming devices/dongles, for access to a wide range of video sources, such as YouTube or Netflix.The built-in 5000 mAh battery is good for up to 2 hours of projection time-enough for a full-length movie.The MP-CD1 features automatic keystone correction. You can place it directly on a table or desk and project a full-screen display without any need to prop it up or use a tripod. It will shine in any business situation.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 157 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Put On A Show Anywhere, Anytime The MP-CD1 is impressively compact and weighs only 9.88 ounces. Just slip it into your briefcase or backpack, and you know you’ll always be ready to make a business pitch during the day or stream an action movie at night. Simple Setup, Quick Start Just connect the HDMI cable from your PC and press the projector’s power button. The MP-CD1 boots up in only 5 seconds, so you can go straight into your business presentation without missing a beat. Wireless Connectivity & Media Streaming W/ HDMI Dongle You can attach a HDMI dongle to provides wireless connectivity for many laptop computers and smartphones [1]. The HDMI and USB ports on the MP-CD1 accept a variety of media-streaming devices/dongles, for access to a wide range of video sources, such as YouTube or Netflix [2]. Dongle not included.

Key Features Flat-out Finess - No Need For A Tripod The MP-CD1 features automatic keystone correction. You can place it directly on a table or desk and project a full-screen display without any need to prop it up or use a tripod. It will shine in any business situation. Short Throw, Large Display The size of the projected image depends on distance, but even for the maximum size (120 inches) you only need 11.48 feet. Even a small living room is just fine. HDMI / MHL Connectivity The HDMI port on this projector is compatible with standard HDMI/MHL inputs. You can connect via cable to laptops, gaming consoles, Android devices, and also Apple devices (using a digital AV adapter, sold separately).

Features III Bulit-In Speaker & Audio Output MP-CD1 is equipped with a built- in speaker of 1.0W. Additionally, the standard audio jack lets you plug in either headphones or external speakers for multimedia entertainment. Gear To Go Supplied with the MP-CD1 is an elegant black carrying case that protects the projector and lens from bumps and scratches. The slipcase design means the projector can be charged without removing it from the case. Other accessories include an HDMI cable, a USB C-C cable for charging, and an adapter so you can also charge with a USB-A to micro USB cable. Auto Keystone Correction & Dynamic Mode With Auto Keystone Correction, even when projecting from an angle onto flat surfaces, the image always looks normal. The MP-CD1 also comes with Dynamic Mode, which automatically enhances the color brightness and saturation of your photos and videos.

[1] Wireless connections depends on OS, software and devices. [2] Netflix streaming membership required. Copyright 2018 Sony Electronics Inc. All rights reserved. Reproduction in whole or in part without written permission is prohibited. Sony and the Sony logo are trademarks of Sony. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications are subject to change without notice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great on the spot travel projector
reviews.reviewText: I never know when I might need to fire up a presentation or demonstration when on the road and this little guy packs small and projects big! Brightness is a small factor/concern but this isn't the tool for a planned presentation so it works perfectly to solve that in the moment need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Instructions are a bit dodgy, read fine print footnotes. Device is solid though.
reviews.reviewText: Great little device so far. I’ve used it for a few hours and these are my first impressions. First the startup procedure needs better instructions. Device arrived with zero charge, a *tiny* footnote in the instructions reveals that this means the device will not function. Even if plugged in, it requires about half an hour to charge to a level where it will power up. This would be a nice piece of information to include in the instructions. Otherwise, seems great. Brightness and resolution are superb for a device of this size/class. Certainly not competition with a full size projector, but not exactly dead last in the running. Even with my semigloss painted wall, it looks pretty decent. Brightness is solid, watched a movie and tv show with no issues. No excessive heat buildup after three hours of use. There is a nice focus adjustment that works well. The device automatically corrects for the ‘keyhole’ effect which is also nice. I used it at varying distance with no issues or real loss of quality up to about 9 feet. After that and the device is simply not strong enough of a projector. Built in speaker works but is pretty crummy as expected for a device of this size. Overall worth the money in my opinion, better instructions would be nice and packaging is kinda annoying. They give you a sleeve for the device but that’s it. A zippered pouch for the cables would be a nice touch for this price point. I’ll write a follow up review in a few months. I travel frequently so we will see how it holds up.-M

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact size and good picture quality.
reviews.reviewText: Great picture for the size of projector. It's very easy to use with minimal controls or settings to fuss with.Connect a Roku, Fire stick, etc... And it performs as expected and well.Definitely a great projector!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sony does it again.
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing. Nifty little gadget and great enough to connect iPhone and watch a movie and watch it against the white wall in my room.I love the focus setting which helps the pictures turn up sharp.Took it to Canada and replayed the videos we took while traveling through.Battery life is about 2 hours. That’s about enough I can handle in a day staying at a screen.Included is a nice leather case which slides through the sides of the player.Product feels like it’s made from good quality materials. It is kinda heavy which I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Useless product！！！Waste a big money for returning！！！
reviews.reviewText: Weird experience. The machine cannot project image at all. It totally wasted delivery cost of $20 and so-called restock fee of $142.31.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for home use, but not for professional use
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 1/10/21This little projector has been my traveling companion for about two years and I have learned to live with its quirks. It is surprisingly bright, works well in a camper or tent, and has a nice case. The speaker is pathetic, however, and the device you are outputting on will send the audio down the HDMI cable if you aren’t also running to a bluetooth speaker. With an external bluetooth speaker, you have about 90 min before the battery runs out. Plugging it into a USB-C port with the included cable gives you a bit more run time, but it eventually runs out of juice. As a result, it does not work well as a permanent install. As a portable, I can’t imagine it getting much smaller. It has a very basic menu function using a single unlabeled button. It would be nice to be able to control things like audio or more in depth video functions, but all you get is normal and vivid picture. There is also a manual focus slider that is very sensitive. It is either in focus or it isn’t - no middle ground. If you need to give a presentation of an hour or less, this is your projector, but it needs more configuration settings to be truly a workhorse.ORIGINAL REVIEW:This little projector works well for basic viewing, but needs some tweaks to make it a five star product.First up is picture quality. It's pretty good. I would really like better adjustment controls to be able to fine-tune the picture, but Sony didn't provide any. The picture controls will all need to be done on whatever device you have connected to the projector. This isn't horrible, just annoying.Second is power. Battery life is really good considering what it's used for. The projector does heat up but not so much that you will smell burning plastic or worry that it will burn you or anyone that touches it. Sony's device also requires USB-C to charge. While it does come with an adapter to charge using standard USB, don't lose it. If you choose to buy this projector (which really is a decent projector), go ahead and buy a back-up charging cord.Another problem with this projector is the speaker quality. Due to the size of this projector there's not really any room for a decent sound system, and it shows. Luckily you can pair this with an external bluetooth speaker for better sound quality. The audio controls are also limited which makes fine tuning not really possible.To make this an incredible portable projector, it would need more/better adjustments for keystone, color temp and other settings, As a simple projector, it works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The projector is good, the utility is very simple, just plug it in! Very convenient! I really like it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome!!!! Handy and powerful projector with great battery back up.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome in its size and quality. Power is just super. Very much satisfied with picture quality. Not much darkness required but sharpness improves as u improve darkness.coluld have given casting within the projector. Carrying one extra adaptor is little problematic. Audio should have been louder.Adding inbuilt casting facility, some more settings solid have made this more interesting.But Sony is Sony .Battery works as mentioned.I strongly suggest this for classroom purpose and house hold purposes, to watch movie etc.In precise small but powerful and handy.
Allnis good but battery power low

The media could not be loaded. 1. Its very compact2. Its very handy3. Once charged, it works for i guess 3 hours4. Output speaker voice is less, but u can connect other music system through aux.5. It work on any light coloured wall, but there should be proper darkness.6. Its portable and good for office use for presentations.7. It cant work properly in open space or little light like other projectors of efson and all.8. Charging time is approximately 3 to 4 hours.9. Picture quality is amazing for hdmi. It makes me feel i am watching movie on home theatre....

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy after going through the reviews
reviews.reviewText: Though it is handy and is supporting Amazon Fire stick, can be connected with laptop or mobile phone, the problem is with the battery. The charge lasts for about 1 HR and without giving any signal it shuts down. Then, it takes at least an hour to charge for using another 15 to 20 mins. The greatest defect I would say it cannot be used while charging. Though somebody mentioned that it can be put to use while charging but in my case I cannot do so. For short time use the projector is good but for using it to watch a movie (about 2 hrs) it's a challenge as you have to give too many breaks for charging the projector.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best pocket projector in the world...
reviews.reviewText: Best pocket projector in the world... Very handy, slim, pocket size... can carry anywhere.. good battery backup... awesome quality... Sony maintain his brand image as well.. good buildup quality and reach carry case for handle.. picture quality is very good upto as 120” tv size... dont think guys... just buy..
